channel.title: How To Change The Exp Rate On A 317
channel.description: title says it all but is there a link, of is there a tut i can have, thanks please tell me if oyu know

item.title: How To Change The Exp Rate On A 317
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

You should always post what base you are on when asking for help, if not in the title, then at least somewhere in the post as doing something like this is different for all bases

If you are on PI

then its in Config.java

public static final int MELEE_EXP_RATE = 320; public static final int RANGE_EXP_RATE = 380; public static final int MAGIC_EXP_RATE = 500;

Damge * Xp Rate = Xp

Read full topic
item.source: How To Change The Exp Rate On A 317
